solution_line_template: Hans's party includes {total_people} - {num_children} = <<{total_people}-{num_children}={num_adults}>>{num_adults} adults and {num_children} children.
The adults will cost {cost_per_adult} * {num_adults} = $<<{cost_per_adult}*{num_adults}={cost_adults}>>{cost_adults} for the deposit.
The children will cost {num_children} * {cost_per_child} = $<<{num_children}*{cost_per_child}={cost_children}>>{cost_children} for the deposit.
Thus, Hans has to pay {cost_adults} + {cost_children} + {flat_deposit} = $<<{cost_adults}+{cost_children}+{flat_deposit}={total_deposit}>>{total_deposit} as a deposit for the restaurant reservation.
